app.description: A tool that allows you to easily mix and organize tracks in Spotify playlists.
app.title: Shuffler for Spotify playlists

auth.error_while_logging_in: An error occurred while logging in

login_security.question: Is logging into the application secure?
login_security.answer: Yes, the login process is handled automatically through Spotify. The application only has access to the data provided by Spotify, such as playlist information and public account details, which ensures security.

sorting_options.question: What are the sorting options?
sorting_options.answer: The application offers various sorting options: by song length, date added to the playlist, popularity, and randomly.

undo_changes.question: Can changes be undone?
undo_changes.answer: No, it is not possible to undo changes made by the application.

mix_duration.question: How long does it take to mix a playlist?
mix_duration.answer: The time required to mix a playlist depends on the selected option and the number of songs in the playlist. The process may vary depending on the chosen option. However, it is known that the playlist will mix faster when the "Random" option is selected.

changes_during_mix.question: Will changes made during the mixing of the playlist be saved if I leave the page during the process?
changes_during_mix.answer: Yes, changes made during the mixing of the playlist will be saved. Once the mixing begins, the order of tracks changes, and leaving the page will preserve the changes that have already been made.

spotify_generated_playlists.question: Why can't I mix playlists generated by Spotify?
spotify_generated_playlists.answer: Some playlists created by Spotify can be modified, and others cannot. Unfortunately, there is no way to determine which playlists can be altered, so the application only displays playlists created by the user.

icon_image.error_while_downloading: An error occurred while downloading the image

not_found.explanation: We couldn't find the page you were looking for. You may have entered an incorrect URL or the page has been removed.

playlist.error_while_creating_playlist: An error occurred while creating the playlist
playlist.error_while_shuffling_playlist: An error occurred while shuffling the playlist

shuffle_options.date_playlist_asc: By date added to playlist (oldest first)
shuffle_options.date_playlist_desc: By date added to playlist (newest first)

statistics.last_24_hours: Number of shuffled songs in the last 24 hours
